misc: Known for deliberating his next shot for a long time, leading to somewhat slow play
biography: Panu, a familiar name at the Hector Trophée from Kotojärven Kartanogolf, is known for his tactical mind and meticulous approach to the game. Although Panu is not expected to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his presence has certainly been felt in past years.

Those who have had the pleasure of playing with Panu will know that he likes to carefully consider his options. This has occasionally been noted to slow down the pace of play, but nobody can deny that Panu is simply trying to optimize his strategy on every single shot.

With three past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Panu has secured one victory, demonstrating his ability to perform under pressure in the pairs format. While he has yet to claim the Victor Trophy for best individual, Panu's consistent performance makes him a formidable competitor.
Although currently considered retired from Hector events, the possibility of a return always lingers, as the allure of competition and camaraderie may yet draw Panu back to the greens.
